one_reviews_text: If you are gonna make a game, make it a good on. This game is the total opposite of a good game.  WHAT EVER YOOU DO, DO NOT PAY TO PLAY!!!!!!!

review_title: Sorta fun but hangups bring it down
one_reviews_text: This game feels like an old nintendo game but it has no in game help menu's on, no support for Gamepad or Touch Controls only mouse controls work. The bat swing by clicking the mouse button is delayed and every other hit is a home run which fills up a meter that wins the game. The Trivia Quiz mode of the game asks questions that make no sense like name a date that "I" hit my first home run or name a ball park without showing any picture of a ball park, these things make no sense. Needs some work.
